Description:
BEAUTIFULLY UPDATED FOR EFFORTLESS LIVING
Corner positioned on Kincumber Drive, a short distance from the heart of lively Croydon, this captivating clinker brick home offers exceptional family living on an easy-care allotment. Whether you are a young family wanting to upsize or first home-owners aspiring to access the market the location and the layout or this beautifully updated home are perfect.
A sophisticated kitchen appointed with stone benchtops, glossy cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar is a chefs delight connecting to the light-filled open plan living and dining areas. Complementing the living zones are three bedrooms all with great-sized robes traditionally positioned off a wide hallway along with a modern central bathroom with bath and shower.
You'll never be pushed for play or entertaining space out in the large mostly covered rear yard with undercover balcony providing a welcome haven for relaxing and hosting guests regardless of the season. Additionally, there is ample lush lawn at the front of the home and oodles of space for a veggie patch, trampoline or childs play area, discreetly positioned behind a private hedge.
Finishing touches include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, modern laundry, plentiful storage, garden shed and double carport accessed from the side street. There is also a driveway and double gate positioned on Hull Road which could easily be converted into additional off-street parking.
Packed with features - this home ticks so many boxes and with shops, transport and a host of other amenities at your fingertips you are also spoilt for choice when it comes to convenience. Stroll down the road to Wyreena Café for your latte or take the dogs for a walk at nearby reserves. You are also a comfortable walk from both kindergartens and schools. An amazing lifestyle awaits. Dont delay. Enquire today.

Description:
The Best Of Both Worlds
A custom built sensation of enduring style and quality, this character family home effortlessly fuses the best of both worlds character charm with contemporary functionality to create an impressive indoor-outdoor entertainer that will instantly capture your heart.
- Fronted by a picket fence, flourishing gardens and a long wrap-around verandah its exterior appeal is profound and perfectly matched by its light, free-flowing floorplan.
- Polished hardwood floors and tall ceilings highlight an inviting entry - flanked by a sitting room, study with built-in desk and a deluxe master suite with a walk-in wardrobe, window seat and dual-basin ensuite with shower and bath tub.
- Three additional bedrooms are located off a rear hall all containing sliding built-in wardrobes and sharing the use of a dual-basin bathroom and power room.
- A gourmet country-chic kitchen is anchored at the heart of the home; containing a 900mm Ilve gas/electric upright cooker and rangehood, new Bosch dishwasher, a Butler's pantry with sink plus Caesarstone benches that double as a breakfast bar.
- The connecting family and dining domain is perfect for enjoying causal meals or relaxing by the wood log fireplace. Complemented a large rear rumpus so parents and children can have their own space.
- Spilling outside, a sprawling covered deck and solar heated swimming pool provide year-round entertainment amid a tranquil, privately hedged setting.
- Enriched with a long list of extras, it includes: ducted heating and vacuum, evaporative and split system cooling, a 5,000L water tank, linen press, laundry and shed storage plus a four-car carport.
- A central no-through road location completes the picture-perfect package. Accessing buses, parks, family restaurants, Mullum Mullum Creek Trail, Good Shepherd Primary School, Luther College and McAdam Square on foot. Minutes from Yarra Valley Grammar, Croydon Central Shopping Centre, Croydon Main Street and Train Station. A quick, direct commute to Eastland and the EastLink freeway.

The secure backyard is well above average for a unit and offers a remarkable opportunity to create your own private oasis, in addition to double gate entry at the side of the home.
Set in a well-established complex, this home is conveniently positioned only a short walk from Arndale Civic Shopping Centre, Croydon Park with barbeque area and playground, Hewish Road Child Care Centre, Ruskin Park and Croydon Primary Schools, Swinburne Tafe, Croydon Memorial Pool, Tarralla Creek, as well as being just a brief drive from EastLink freeway, The Good Shepherd Primary School and Tintern Grammar.
